about_text: I was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Since I can remember, I have felt a deep connection with the land and the life around me...
about_message_text: Art is an endless journey, a window to the soul and the nature that surrounds us...
about_message_highlight: Art is not only observed, it is lived.
contact_description: If you have any questions or want more information about my work, send me a message.
contact_success: Your message has been successfully sent!
